title: Insurance giant Zurich's $100M settlement to cover losses suffered by Mondelez International from NotPetya could reshape the entire cyber insurance marketplace (Suzanne Smalley/CyberScoop)
description:
Suzanne Smalley / CyberScoop:
Insurance giant Zurich's $100M settlement to cover losses suffered by Mondelez International from NotPetya could reshape the entire cyber insurance marketplace  —  The settlement last week in a $100 million lawsuit over whether insurance giant Zurich should cover losses Mondelez International suffered …
